level.text: The Board shall be composed of one (1) standing committee, which shall be the Committee of the Whole.
The Committee of the Whole shall review all matters presented by the Executive Director and make recommendations to the Board on those matters.

The Board may also establish ad hoc committees at any time by a resolution of a majority of the Board which shall set forth the name, purposes and, where appropriate, the specified term of the existence of the ad hoc committee.
The Chairperson shall appoint a chairperson and member(s) to the ad hoc committees.

An ad hoc committee shall be dissolved upon submission of a final report and recommendation(s) to the Board, or upon the expiration of a specified term of the committee if the term is in the establishing resolution, or by vote of a majority the Board.
